media.news:
v1.48
- Fix playback resuming which was broken in v1.47 due to the ExoPlayer update.

v1.47
- Updated providers.
- Updated ExoPlayer to v2.7.3
- Improved player error handling.
- New option to enable reCaptcha solving for some websites (disabled by default).

v1.46
- Attempt to fix crashes from screen orientation changes.
- Add "Play with" option for sources(long click to display dialog).
- Add "Copy URL" option for sources(long click to display dialog).
- Minor tweaks on some providers.
